ModMetaData.name: LandingZone
ModMetaData.author: LandingZone contributors
ModMetaData.description: LandingZone helps you find the perfect settlement location by filtering world tiles based on climate, terrain, resources, and geographic features. Choose from quick preset configurations or dive into advanced filtering with 40+ criteria. The mod uses an intelligent two-phase architecture to efficiently search thousands of tiles and rank results by your preferences.
